about_the_game:
EternaMine is a game focused around mining, mining will earn you various different currencies which can be used to upgrade your gear and unlock various things.

Mining

There's different mines to explore and tons of different ores to see. There's currently four different mine types in Eternamine:

  • Standard mine - A standard "square" mine that will refill once it's been mined out enough, good for beginner miners

  • Deep mines - Strange mines that seems to go infinitely deep with better and better ores the further down you go. Some say there's treasure buried deep below...

  • Dark mines - Magical mines that only open up every now and then, most experienced miners seek these mines out as soon as they open because the treasures they hold are truly something else. Make sure your sword and body is in good shape though as you won't be alone in there...

  • Contest mine - The contest mine is a special kind of mine with separate upgrades and a separate currency. Each month, all players of Eternamine can compete in who can be the biggest earner of the mine, with the winners receiving grand rewards. Each month the mine is completely reset and the contents of it as well as the available upgrades are changed.

Your pickaxe is your most important tool in this world. It can be upgraded with tons of upgrades, some that will increase it's strength, speed, reach as well as lots of "PROCC" upgrades. Along with upgrading your pickaxe, it can also be pimped out with various skins and particle effect to make your mining adventure as flashy as possible

Dungeons

The dungeons are areas where you can gain massive wealth if you're brave enough. With a dungeon key, you can enter a dungeon and take on the enemies that reside there, each defeated enemy will give you some rewards and after you have defeated a certain amount, the boss of that dungeon may spawn...

Make sure you're ready to take on a dungeon before entering it, as a key for that dungeon will be consumed every time you enter, no matter if you come out victorious or perish...

Your sword is your most trusted companion alongside your pickaxe. In order to defend yourself from the enemies in the dungeon and the dark mines, you will need a good and reliable sword. Your sword can be upgraded in various ways as well as pimped out with various skins and particle effects, everything to make your fighting as flashy as possible. Along with upgrading your sword, you can also equip and upgrade various abilities in order to maximize your chances of coming out of the dungeons alive, some of the available abilities include: "Blink", "Dash", "Sword throw" & "Shockwave"

Key features

  • A major gameplay loop with levelling, prestiging and rebirthing

  • 4 Different gamemodes & 3 game difficulties

  • 35+ Different upgrades

  • A skill tree with 140+ Skills

  • 75+ Different items

  • 11 Unlockable pets

  • Quests

  • Unlockable idle and offline gains

  • Online leaderboards & contests

  • Hours and hours of content

Tons of items

The world of eternamine has lots and lots of different items to use and utilize to secure the biggest wealth you could imagine, items vary in rarity and can be obtained in various different ways. Some items can be opened for rewards, some will give you temporary buffs, others will help you clear out a mine quicker while others can be crafted into new items. Oh and don't forget those dungeon keys...

short_description: Mine, fight monsters, upgrade your gear, obtain rare items, unlock new powers and mine some more in the massive follow-up to the popular title "Haste-Miner 2". Eternamine offers a casual yet engaging gameplay experience, expand your mining empire and discover the secrets that lie beneath the earth.
